类的使用
org.springframework.core.io.buffer.NettyDataBuffer

  • 使用NettyDataBuffer的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.core.io.buffer
    Generic abstraction for working with byte buffer implementations.

    • org.springframework.core.io.buffer中NettyDataBuffer的使用

      返回NettyDataBuffer的org.springframework.core.io.buffer中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBufferFactory.allocateBuffer() 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBufferFactory.allocateBuffer(int initialCapacity) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.capacity(int capacity) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.read(byte[] destination) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.read(byte[] destination, int offset, int length) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.readPosition(int readPosition) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.slice(int index, int length) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBufferFactory.wrap(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf byteBuf)
      Wrap the given Netty ByteBuf in a NettyDataBuffer.
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBufferFactory.wrap(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.write(byte b) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.write(byte[] source) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.write(byte[] source, int offset, int length) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.write(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf... byteBufs)
      Writes one or more Netty ByteBufs to this buffer, starting at the current writing position.
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.write(java.nio.ByteBuffer... buffers) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.write(DataBuffer... buffers) 
      NettyDataBuffer NettyDataBuffer.writePosition(int writePosition)
